hadiths.text: It was narrated that Az-Zuhri said:"I heard Abu Al-Ahwas saying to us in a gathering with Ibn Al-Musayyab when Ibn Al-Musayyab was sitting there, that he had heard Abu Dharr say: The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: "Allah (SWT) continues to look upon His slave while he is praying, so long as he does not turn away. If he turns his face away, He turns away from him

chapter.ara-name: باب التَّشْدِيدِ فِي الاِلْتِفَاتِ فِي الصَّلاَةِ
chapter.eng-name: Stern warning against turning around when praying
